item.description:
GUANTANAMO:
Into the 7th Year
 
Tuesday, June 24, 2008
7:30 p.m.
Newton Main Library
330 Homer Street
Newton Centre
 
Presenters:
Doris Tennant and Ellen Lubell
Newton lawyers representing pro-bono
a young man imprisoned at Guantanamo
 
Co-sponsored by:
Newton Dialogues
Social Workers for Peace and Justice
Human Rights Commission of Newton
Historical Society of Newton
 
Donations to support this ongoing work
may be made at the presentation.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: GUANTANAMO: Into the 7th Year
